title: The Best of The Herd
itunes:title: The Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a look at the spiraling Seahawks after a loss to the Rams and why they are operating like a poor version of a more successful NFL rival. He believes this NFC team might be the ugliest team to make the playoffs this season. He also discusses the latest injuries for the defending Super Bowl Champion Buccaneers and why this is bad news for Tom Brady. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Mark Schlereth joins the show to give his thoughts on what the Broncos need to do in the off season to keep up in the AFC.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
